name: Blitz Ball
description:
My first game published 

 Cf usingGDevelop and my first Game Jam.

Right now only 1P 1v1 is playable.

Controls are arrow keys to move and B button to hit in the direction you face.

The object is to have the most points by the end of 2 rounds.

You collect blitz balls and separate them into the appropriate color goals. You get a Point for every blue ball that goes into the blue goal. You take away a point for every red ball you out in the red team's goal.

Good Luck. 

PS the last hours of working on it the frame rate dropped, I am sorry.
